features_textures_description: You can enable as many packs as you want, but if multiple packs replace the same file the order matters. For example if two packs replace the grass, the first pack in the list will take precedence.
features_textures_invalidPack: Invalid texture pack format, ensure it contains a top-level `texture_replacements` folder.
features_textures_moveDown_buttonAlt: move texture pack down in order
features_textures_moveUp_buttonAlt: move texture pack up in order
gameControls_button_compile_helpText: Rebuild the game. (ie. after modifying OpenGOAL source code)
gameControls_button_copyExecutableComman: For running the game outside the launcher.
gameControls_button_decompile_helpText: Extracts game assets (ie. to apply texture replacements)
gameControls_button_uninstall_confirmati: Are you sure you want to uninstall?
gameControls_button_uninstall_helpText: This will not delete any saves or settings
gameControls_noToolingSet_subheader: Head over to the following settings page to download the latest release
gameName_jak1: Jak and Daxter: El llegat dels precursors
gameUpdate_versionMismatch_currentlyInst: El joc ja està instal·lat amb
gameUpdate_versionMismatch_nextSteps: You can either update the game to this new version (no save data will be lost) or you can rollback your active version to match
help_description_createAnIssue: You can either ask a question on our Discord, or create a GitHub issue with as much detail as possible.
help_description_duplicateReminder: In either location, please do a quick search to see if the question has already been answered before
help_foreword: Si esteu reportant un problema o esteu demanant ajuda, descarregueu el següent fitxer de suport i adjunteu-lo al vostre fil de Discord o GitHub.
requirements_button_bypass_warning_1: If you believe the requirement checks are false, you can bypass them.
requirements_button_bypass_warning_2: However, if you are wrong you should expect issues installing or running the game!
requirements_cpu_avxExplanation_1: This cannot be fixed without upgrading to a newer CPU
requirements_cpu_avxExplanation_2: El suport d'AVX ha sigut estàndard des de 2011
requirements_cpu_doesNotSupportAVX: La teva CPU no suporta AVX
requirements_cpu_unableToCheckAVX: No es pot verificar si la teva CPU suporta AVX
requirements_gpu_avxExplanation_2: You can attempt to upgrade your GPU drivers
requirements_gpu_avxExplanation_3: En cas contrari, haureu d'actualitzar la vostra GPU, la majoria de les GPU des del 2012 l'admeten
requirements_gpu_unableToCheckOpenGL: No es pot verificar si la teva CPU suporta AVX
requirements_notMet_header: Unfortunately, your system does not meet all the minimum requirements or we were unable to check them
settings_general_button_resetSettings_co:
Estàs segur que vols restablir la configuració del llançador? Aquesta acció reiniciarà el teu directori d'instal·lació i desfarà qualsevol canvi de configuració que hagis fet.
Això no afectarà els fitxers del joc.
settings_versions_devel_description: This list serves as a convenient area to stage, manage and test new releases (either official or unofficial). This list will always require manual management via it's respective folder
settings_versions_invalidReleaseWithReas: Release marked as invalid for the following reasons:
settings_versions_official_description: Official versions are from the `jak-project` GitHub repository
settings_versions_unofficial_description: Les versions no oficials solen ser versions modificades del 'jak-project' per permetre canvis o contingut nou. Aquestes no reben suport de l'equip d'OpenGOAL i s'hauran d'afegir manualment a la carpeta
setup_installationFailed: S'ha produït un error en la instal·lació.
setup_prompt_selectFolderWithISO: Select a folder with your ISO's data extracted
setup_prompt_selectISO: Select your legitimately obtained ISO File
splash_deleteOldInstallDir: Ja no es necessita la carpeta d'instal·lació anterior, vols esborrar-la?
splash_noInstallDirSet: No s'ha establert cap carpeta d'instal·lació!
temp_jak2_indev_header: Jak II es troba en desenvolupament
temp_jak2_indev_subheader: In the meantime, check out our latest progress reports showcasing what we've accomplished so far
update_alreadyUpToDate: Ja teniu la versió més recent!
update_description: View the changes below and click the button to update to the latest version. The launcher will restart when finished.
gameControls_toolingTooOld_header: Tooling Version Does Not Support Game!
gameControls_toolingTooOld_subheader: Head over to the following settings page to download the latest release
gameControls_beta_headerB: You will encounter minor bugs and instability.
gameControls_beta_issueTracker_linkPreTe: For a list of all known issues, see
gameControls_beta_bugReport_linkPreText: To submit a non-duplicate bug report, see
